duties_responsibilities.duty: Process and maintain multi-state payrolls, ensuring accuracy and compliance with payroll tax regulations.
Analyze and process payroll for over 2,400 employees, addressing any out of balance conditions and ensuring timely delivery.
Interpret new legislation impacting payroll and support internal and external audits related to payroll and benefit plans.
Resolve issues related to payroll production and maintain payroll information in accordance with statutory requirements.
Prepare and generate reports, assess procedures, develop automation, and support HRIS and Time and Attendance systems.
Resolve employee questions/issues related to payroll and assist with day-to-day administration of HR policies and programs.
Protect the interests of employees and the organization in accordance with HR policies and governmental laws and regulations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field (Certified Payroll Professional certification preferred)
